description: 3D browser-based action/adventure game with Minecraft-GTA hybrid mechanics

tasks.notes: Project initialized with Vite, React 19, Three.js, Elysia, Bun runtime, Docker for Postgres/Redis
Complete database schema with Drizzle ORM: players, inventory, skills, quests, world_objects, achievements, sessions. Includes seed data, query utilities, and comprehensive game data definitions.

Implemented R3F Canvas with proper lighting (ambient + directional with shadows), PointerLockControls for first-person camera, 100x100 ground plane with procedural grass texture and voxel grid visualization, Sky component for environment, instructions overlay UI with crosshair. Scene maintains 60 FPS, pointer lock/unlock working correctly.

Implemented complete player movement system with ZQSD keyboard controls, Rapier physics (capsule collider), smooth camera following with player position tracking, sprint system with stamina drain/regen, jump with gravity, ground detection, Zustand store for player state management. HUD displays health/stamina bars, crosshair, and controls hint. Movement feels responsive with proper acceleration/deceleration and friction. Sprint drains 20 stamina/sec, regens 15/sec when not sprinting. Walk speed: 5 units/sec, Sprint: 8 units/sec, Jump force: 10 units, Gravity: -30 units/secÂ².

Added keyboard inputs (1-2 for weapon switching, left-click for attack, R for reload). Implemented melee combat with raycast hit detection (2m range, 10 stamina cost, crit chance). Implemented ranged combat with projectile physics (bullet drop, 12 round clip, 60 reserve ammo, 1.5s reload time). Updated HUD to display current weapon, ammo counter, and reloading status. Attack cooldown system prevents spam clicking. WeaponController component manages all combat logic in game loop. Console logs for hit confirmation (enemies will be added in Task 2.2).
